statements: DELETE FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id = 100 AND performance_score < 4.5;
DELETE FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 100 AND evaluator_id = 200;
DELETE FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales' AND hire_date >= '2021-01-01'
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformanceEvaluations WHERE evaluation_id = 100 AND employee_id = 500
DELETE FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' AND hire_date < '2021-01-01'
DELETE FROM Evaluation WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT');
